name: Multisim 12 Project
summary: An MP12 file is a project created by version 12 of Multisim, a program used to design, analyze, and simulate printed circuit boards ( PCB ). It contains references to circuit designs stored in .MS12 files and may include simulation results, documents, and reports. MP12 files are used to organize and manage multiple designs in a project.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
